title: Advanced Managerial Course Based on Neuroanatomical e-Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Terminology and Understanding of Neurological Structures
context.additional_context: Advanced training for managers conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the functions of major neural pathways with 85% accuracy through 3D animation and interactive content.
Learners can correctly identify anatomical causes of neurological symptoms (paralysis, sensory abnormalities, etc.) in three consecutive quizzes with over 80% accuracy by analyzing virtual cases.
Learners can achieve at least 75% proficiency in weekly formative assessments through a mobile-optimized evaluation system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
